bibl.author: Emil Arctander
bibl.title: Emil Arctander to Walt Whitman, 17 June 1872
bibl.idno: MSS18630, Box: 77, Folder: Supplementary Papers, Speeches & Writing Files, Schmidt, Rudolf
bibl.orgName: The Charles E. Feinberg Collection of the Papers of Walt Whitman, 1839–1919, Library of Congress, Washington, DC.

opener.dateline: Royal Danish D. Consulate, Washington D.C.. June 17th, 1872

body.p: I received your letter of the 11th inst.instant to-day and take my translation up till the first quotation on page 180. I have been quite unwell for the last 3 or 4 days otherwise I should have finished the whole article. Hoping that it may be of use to you, and that you will remember that I have only been here in this country 7 years, and therefore will excuse the many mistakes I have made, I am, fin.,
